title: What are the best coding classes for kids near me? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best coding class in India as per me is Cedarwood Aftershool. They have very experienced teachers and give personal attention to all the kids. My child is learning coding and programming from them so this review is from personal experience. You should definitely check their website. They also have some Lockdown discounts going on. You can check that out. Hope this was helpful
